summary: WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE IS HAVING DIFFICULTY COMING TO A FULL STOP. THE BREAK BOOSTER IS THE ISSUE. TWO MORE BREAK BOOSTERS WERE SWITCHED IN THE VEHICLE. THE CARE IS STILL HAVING THE SAME PROBLEM. A TOTAL OF FOUR BREAK BOOSTERS HAS BEEN REPLACED IN THE VEHICLE ACCORDING TO THE MAINTENANCE HISTORY.  THE CAR HAS BECOME A SAFETY HAZARD WHILE DRIVING.
